eager.title: Cultivating Visualization Literacy for Children Through Curiosity and Play
eager.sentence: Exploring how constructionist practices can help children accumulate playful learning experiences and personalize visualizations made out of everyday materials.
eager.venue: IEEE Transactions on Visualization and Computer Graphics (to appear in proc. IEEE VIS 2022)

dataphys.title: Making Data Tangible: A Cross-Disciplinary Design Space for Data Physicalization
dataphys.sentence: A design space that analyzes the interrelationship of key factors (context, structure, interactions) when designing a physicalization.
dataphys.venue: ACM Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems (CHI)

dustdevil.title: Maximizing Dust Devil Follow-Up Observations on Mars Using Cubesats and On-board Scheduling
dustdevil.sentence: A mission of constellation of low orbiting Mars cube sats to maximize the number of dust devil follow-up observations through real-time, on-board scheduling.
dustdevil.venue:
Proceedings of 31st AAS/AIAA Space Flight Mechanics Meeting
Journal of Astronautical Sciences

smartcity.title: User Interfaces for Smart Cities
smartcity.sentence: An overview of how interfaces play a role in smart cities.
smartcity.venue: In the Springer Handbook of Smart Cities.

mosaic.title: MOSAIC Viewer: A Visual Analytics Approach to Debugging Cooperative, Autonomous Multi-Robot Systems' Worldviews
mosaic.sentence: A visual analytics tool that helps operators detect and conduct a root cause analysis of robots‚Äô desynchronized worldviews.

spinneret.title: Spinneret: Aiding Creative Ideation through Non-Obvious Concept Associations
spinneret.sentence: A functional approach to aid mind mapping by providing suggestions based on a knowledge graph.
spinneret.venue: ACM Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems (CHI)

diypaper.title: Touching Information with DIY Paper Charts & AR Markers
diypaper.sentence: Exploration of how informal learning through creation and play can help increase data literacy and engagement.
